sentences.sContent: The world's artwork market capitalization is overwhelming tide and trend.
sentences.sContent_eng: The world's artwork market capitalization is overwhelming tide and trend.
sentences.sCn: 世界艺术品市场的资本化是势不可挡的潮流和趋势。

sentences.sContent: Program management is the focus of the fourth part of the course where issues of program design, operations and capitalization will be reviewed.
sentences.sContent_eng: Program management is the focus of the fourth part of the course where issues of program design, operations and capitalization will be reviewed.
sentences.sCn: 本课程的第四部分会着重于项目管理的讲解，在这部分的讲解中会回顾一下项目设计、运作和资本化等问题。

sentences.sContent: This book teaches through questions about the mechanics of capitalization and punctuation, grammar, sentence structure, paragraph development, and essay questions.
sentences.sContent_eng: This book teaches through questions about the mechanics of capitalization and punctuation, grammar, sentence structure, paragraph development, and essay questions.
sentences.sCn: 这本书教的问题，通过对力学的资本化和标点符号，语法，句子结构，段发展， 征文提问。
